data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong northeast monsoon will affect the coast of southern China over the Lunar New Year holidays. It will be cloudier with temperatures falling slightly on Lunar New Year's Day. It will be cool in the morning and the weather will be brighter during the day over the region on the second and third days of Lunar New Year. The monsoon is expected to moderate in the latter part of this week. Winds will be weak and it will be warm during the day over the coastal areas of Guangdong over the weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260217","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
